newsletter.title: 1st General Body Meeting: Skills for Recent Grads & Young Professionals
newsletter.description:
Wednesday September 21, 2016 6:30 PM
Austin Energy Room 130
721 Barton Springs Rd.
Austin, TX 78704
 Join Society of Hispanic Professional Engineers as we kick off the 2016-2017 year. Our first keynote speaker, Jo Anna Ordonez, is dedicated to the improvement and success of underrepresented communities in STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics). Stop by and learn the "TALONS: Talents, Adaptability, Leadership, Openness, Networking, and Service" successful leaders employ to soar above others in all aspects of their lives.

newsletter.title: MentorNet
newsletter.description:
Feeling inspired to mentor a future STEM professional? Think you lack the time in your busy schedule? THINK AGAIN!

SHPE provides a new virtual mentoring avenue allowing professionals to pair with students nationwide.

Join MentorNet today!

newsletter.title: News You Can Use
newsletter.description: IBM is coordinating a global competition to develop and demonstrate how humans can utilize AI technologies to tackles the world's grand challenges. This is a 3 year competition that will provide a $3 MIL grand prize to the top team. If you're interested in being a part of this breakthrough competition, you must sign up by December 1st, 2016 (OR October 15th for Early Bird Registration). To register, on the image.

newsletter.title: FREE Membership
newsletter.description:
Random Fact Friday


Be the first person to post a random fact on any of our social media pages @SHPEAustin on 8/26/16 and get a FREE yearly membership.
